title: Opinion on novel coronavirus COVID-19 as a health issue India 2020
summary: This statistic shows the results of a 2013 survey among Americans aged 16 and older regarding the qualities they are looking for in a close friend . This statistic only shows the top five answers to that question . 81 percent of the respondents stated a close friend has to be loyal .

data.Response: Don't believe it can impact us or Indians at large
Don't believe it can impact us
